mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price,product_category,file_name, file_name_real, file_size, register_date) values(#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_category},#{file_name},#{file_name_real},#{file_size},sysdate())
mapper.select: select * from product order by product_name
mapper.update:
update product
product_name=#{product_name},
product_price =#{product_price},
product_category =#{product_category},
update_date = sysdate()
where product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from prod_cart where product_no = #{product_no} and userid = #{userid}

select p.file_name_real, p.product_name, p.product_price, pc.product_no, pc.amount from prod_cart as pc join product as p on pc.product_no = p.product_no join prod_user as pu on pc.userid = pu.userid where pu.userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from prod_cart where product_no = #{product_no} and userid = #{userid}
